content: crochet bunting banner measurements each triangle measures approx 6 5 tall and 7 5 wide a 7 piece banner measures approx 7 feet pulled straight it will be less once you hang it up and let it drape materials yarn - for the piece pictured here i used worsted weight 4 25m per triangle plus 25m for the connecting chain across the top - i used loops and threads impeccable yarn 4 5oz/127 5g 285yds/260m in the following colours - 50m white - 50m smoke - 50m teal - 50m sapphire hook - 5 0mm scissors tapestry needle *you could use any sized yarn and matching hook but the size of the finished product will change accordingly stitches used chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch pattern notes turn after every row there is no need to weave in ends as you can crochet over your ends when you complete the border and attach the triangles together you can customize the length and look of your banner by changing the length of the chain between triangles
